title: Lake Chelan National Recreation Area: Park Fun
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Park Fun              Park Fun           Park Ranger explores nature and trees along the River Loop trail with families. Cindy Bjorklund/NPS  Summer family programs take place at the North Cascades Visitor Center (State Route 20 milepost 120), the Golden West Visitor Center in Stehekin near the head of Lake Chelan, and at Hozomeen near the north end of Ross Lake. Summer hikes and canoe trips at the new North Cascades Environmental Learning Center are offered in cooperation with the North Cascades Institute.  Ask for other kid friendly fun while visiting the park.
